attributes.action: Make the sale and ownership of gin traps illegal with UK
attributes.additional_details:
Having a recent experience of my own cat being trapped in one of these traps, it has been made clear to me , with some research, that these are still being used within the UK. Trapping and harming all manner of animals including cats, dogs, foxes, and hedgehogs for instance,

These are arcane and evil devices and are designed to inflict as much harm as possible to animals. This law needs to be closed as soon as possible to stop the pain being inflicted onto unsuspecting and innocent animals.

Link to recent artcile in local press: https://www.newsshopper.co.uk/news/17913422.39-love-meet-person-placed-39---man-39-s-warning-cat-caught-illegal-trap/
attributes.background: Since 1958 the use of gin traps has been illegal within the UK. However, in a loop hole it is still legal to own and sell these dangerous traps.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir David Evennett MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Bexleyheath and Crayford

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dr Liam Fox MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: North Somerset
